metadata.synopsis: Terry (Nick Moran) is an undercover agent on an assignment, getting closer and closer to bringing down crime boss Simon Bacig (Stephen Lang). When Bacig invites Terry and his wife to a swank party, Terry panics because he made the wife up. His commanding officer (Michael Kopsa) appoints sexy Susan (Jennifer Esposito), a rookie cop with no undercover experience, to the role. Susan throws herself into it, starting an affair with Bacig to further the case. But this only complicates matters.
